column3: ttadfeɣ taddart ay iyi-yehwan yernu ur ttaggadeɣ seg yiwen.

column1: Neẓra dakken tagrawt tamẓerbeḍḍut la tetteg taḥemla n ucemmet deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen mgal kra n yimdanen ay tt-yexḍan. D ayyuren aya seg wasmi ay la d-njemmeɛ inzaten akken ad neccetki fell-asen deg teɣdemt. Wid ay yesmendgen times deg tḥemla-a ulac akk sanda ara rewlen.

Aṭas seg yimẓerbeḍḍa-nni ay yettekkan deg tḥemla n ucemmet ed tirawt n yiznan n tuggza ttwassnen s yismawen-nsen n tidet deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen. D aya ay aɣ-yeǧǧan ad neccetki fell-asen ɣer yimeẓla n tɣellist ay yebdan yagi tasestant-nnes akken ad ten-id-tezzuɣer ɣer tnefrut.
Ma ur telliḍ d yiwen seg-sen
column2: ur telliḍ d acemma ɣer-sen
column3: yerna i wakken ad tiliḍ d yiwen seg-sen
column4: yessefk ad tiliḍ tluleḍ-d deg tmurt-nsen yerna tgiḍ am nitni
column5: yerna yessefk daɣen ad tettxemmimeḍ am nitni. Skud temgerradeḍ fell-asen
column6: ad k-keṛhen war tasebba. Nitni d imsiriyen.

column1: Igḍaḍ axxam-nsen d tiẓgi
column2: iselman axxam-nsen d asif
column4: ma d igerdan imeẓyanen axxam-nsen d Ccinwa. Nḥemmel tamurt-nneɣ seg wasmi ara nili d imeẓyanen
column5: swaswa am yegḍaḍ ay iḥemmlen tiẓgi
column6: iselman ay iḥemmlen asif akked tzizwa ay iḥemmlen tijejjigin.

column1: Bɣan ad awyen akal
column2: maca llan yemdanen deg wakal-nni. Bɣan ad hennin seg yemdanen-nni
column3: dɣa semman-asen iweḥciyen. Ma ifat semman-asen iweḥciyen
column4: imdanen-nni ur mazal ad ttwaḥesben d imdanen. Dɣa yeqqel ussenger-nsen iḥell
column5: yerna akka ara yeqqel wakal n kra n ljens d ayla n ljens niḍen.

column1: Mi ara iwali kra n temsal ɛeddant tilas
column2: lbaṭel yessemɣi-d acciwen
column4: imir-nni kan ad yeɛnu adeg anda ara yeqqim ala iman-is
column5: ad d-yerfed imru ad d-yernu taferkit tamellalt
column6: ad yebdu ad yessuru iḥulfan-is fell-as
column7: s usefru ara yaru deg tutlayt-nni iwumi immečč lheqq.

column1: Neṛja armi d asmi ay d-yewweḍ uɣella n tegrawt tamẓerbeḍḍut
column2: s usenfar-nnes n ubeḍḍu
column3: akken ad nẓer d acu-tt tutlayt ay nessawal. S waya
column4: yessefk ad nzelli neɣ ad nesserɣ akk idlisen n tesnilest ay d-uran Chaker
column7: Haddadou ed waṭas n yimazzagen niḍen. Tanemmirt a imẓerbeḍḍa.

column1: Nekni s weɣref n Yiwunak-Yedduklen
column2: akken ad teblel ugar tdukli-nneɣ
column5: u ad nessijhed timḥaddit tucrikt d liser amatu
column6: u ad neḍmen lfayda i ɣ-d-tewwi tlelli i nekni d wid ara d-iḍefren deffir-neɣ
column7: atan ad d-nesyi Tamendawt-a i Iwunak n Marikan Yedduklen.

column1: Imẓerbeḍḍa ay aɣ-d-yuznen iznan n tuggza ɣilen dakken mazal tallit-nni aydeg ara yazen yiwen izen aliktṛunan i wayeḍ yernu yiwen ur yezmir ad iẓer seg wansi ay t-id-yuzen. Ass-a tella temsulta tussnant yernu zemren ad d-jebden s kra n unejrim ara yesqedcen aselkim-nnes akken ad yazen yes-s iznan n tuggza.
Inglusaksunen mačči kan d akal-ik ara awin. Ad k-ṭṭfen daɣen d akli
column2: dɣa mara temmteḍ ad sersen iɣsan-ik di kra usalay u ad k-id-gelmen deg idlisen umezruy ara arun am akken d aweḥci i tuɣ telliḍ. Syin ad rnun ad gen fell-ak isura iwakken ad d-beyynen amek akken telliḍ tcemteḍ d wamek fazen isaṭṭen-nsen deg tebɣest.

column1: Imgura ay ttnaɣen Yiwunak Yeddukklen deg Asya ur sɛin assaɣ akked tugdut neɣ assenger n tremmiɣt. Wi d imgura ikelsertiyen ayyes Iwunak Yeddukklen bɣan ad awyen apitṛul n Wegmuḍ Alemmas
column2: Quqaz ed Asya Talemmast
column3: yerna bɣan daɣen ad ḥeṛsen timura ay ijehden am Rusya
column4: Ccinwa ed Lhend i wakken ur tetterni tezmert-nsent.

column1: Yemma-s mi ara tetturar d mmi-s netta mazal-it iteṭteḍ tabbuct
column2: tecennu-as akka: Ad nǧelleb tiǧellibin Am wuccen ɣer tebḥirin Ad d-nawi tiqlalacin I yemma-s
column3: ad d-tfek tiɛuɛɛucin ɛeslama seg xuxuc Taqbuct n ɛuɛɛuc Sbaḥ lxir seg yiḍes Ay ajeǧǧig n yifires Sbaḥ lxir a leɛyun n ṭṭir Ṭṭbeq n uzanǧar iwimi yekkes uqedmir .

column1: Ata yuli-d ṣṣut n lbuq
column2: dɣa akken i s-yesla wegdud
column4: ihi u ad yedrem ugadir ɣef tikelt. Din din
column12: akraren d yeɣyal : meḥsub ayen akk tuɣ yettidiren deg temdint.

column1: Qbel ciṭuḥ
column2: iḍ-a
column3: yewweḍ-iyi-d usiwel d imreyyes maḍi sɣur usinatur McCain. Asinatur McCain aṭas i iwet
column4: i yesɛedda deg tawayt-a n tefranin. Iwet ugar yerna yesɛedda daɣen aṭas ɣef tmurt i iḥemmel. Yeqbel ad isebbel ɣef Marikan ayen ur d-tessugun tuget deg-neɣ. S wayen i d-yefka umqeddem-a abɣas ur yezdiɣ ṭṭmeɛ

column1: Allo? Yemma? D acu a Sami. Yella baba deg uxxam? Ih. Zemreɣ ad mmeslayeɣ yid-s? Atan la yessucuf. Yemma? D acu a aɛziz-iw? Bɣiɣ ad kem-id-xebbreɣ s kra. D acu-t? Ilaq ad tiliḍ tzemreḍ i tmesliwt-is
column2: akk-a? Ih
column3: d acu-t? Yeḍra kra yessexlaɛen i Farid. D acu?! A ya? Allo? Mazal-iken din? Ahya a Ṛebbi! A ya ... suref-iyi a ya

column1: Ɣilen yimẓerbeḍḍa dakken ma regmen yiwen neɣ sin seg yimeɣnasen n tmaziɣt
column2: d Amussu Adelsan Amaziɣ s timmad-nnes ara iḥebsen. Imẓerbeḍḍa d leɛṛuṛ
column5: amahil-nsen d lɛaṛ yernu ur tettɛeḍḍil ara ad teɣli tegrawt-nsen
column6: ad tt-yessired zzman am uxunnis n yiẓẓan mi ara t-tessired tḥemmalt n waman deg wass n ugeffur.

column1: Ad shersen akal
column2: ad ẓẓɛen seg-s iserwen
column3: ad d-sbedden anhil amsiri ara iqeren iserwen ay d-yeqqimen
column5: yernu ad ɣsen ad ddren deg talwit deg wakud aydeg ara kemmlen ad snegzaren iserwen yernu ad asen-semmin i wakk wid ay yezban iremmaɣen
column6: akken yebɣu yili webrid n wezbu-nsen. D ta ay d tilawt torwellit aydeg ddren kra n yiɣerfan.

column1: Aɣrab n ubeḍḍu amsiri deg Falesṭin yesɛa
column2: ɣef leḥsab-inu
column3: nnfeɛ atakti. Ad d-yili weɣrab-a d agadir lemmer ad d-yenker wemgaru n ussenger yessexlaɛen kra n wass ɣef lǧal n uṭṭerḍeq n wurfan n Yifalesṭiniyen ay yeddren acḥal n tmerwin n yiseggasen ddaw lbaṭel ay ten-imeḥqen. Ad yili wemgaru-a d ssebba i ussedrem d tuẓẓɛa n Yifalesṭiniyen ineggura seg Ugemmaḍ Utrim

column1: Ur d tamurt-nwen kan ay yellan deg umaḍal. Lemmer ad teddum s agafa
column2: ad tafem Kanada
column3: Agaraw Aṛkti ed Rusya. Lemmer ad teddim s anẓul
column5: Guatemala ed wakk Tamrikt arma d Taṛjentint n ed Cili. Deg wegmuḍ
column6: ad tafem Tuṛuft ed Tefriqt s wakk iɣlanen-nsent. Deg utaram
column7: ad tafem Asya s wakk iɣerfan ed yidelsan-nnes. Kenwi d aḥric kan seg umaḍal. Ur d amaḍal ay yellan d aḥric seg-wen.

column1: D iserdasen i nella di Fransa
column2: yerna d iɣermanen. D ssebba-iḍen iss ara nzuxx
column3: imi d iɣermanen ! Meḥsub igellilen ilaq-asen ad ɛassen u ad ḥadren ɣef yimeṛkantiyen inezmaren ur nesɛi ara xedmen. Yessefk ad aɣen awal i temsawit isuḍaf i igedlen nadam ddaw tqneṭyar ama i imeṛkantiyen neɣ i igellilen am akken i sen-teqḍeɛ daɣ tuttra deg iberdan d tukerḍa n weɣrum. D aḥric si lxir d-tewwi Tegrawla.

column1: Imi ay bɣan yimẓerbeḍḍa ad rren tantala taqbaylit d tutlayt i yiman-nnes
column2: ttxil-wen
column3: init-iyi-d: Amek ara ḥesben tasaḥlit? D tantala taqbaylit neɣ d tutlayt i yiman-nnes? Ferhat Mehenni
column5: yezmer ad yegzu tasaḥlit? I ma ur tt-yegzi ara
column6: ad tt-yeḥseb d tutlayt neɣ d tantala kan n teqbaylit? Imẓerbeḍḍa werǧin ad d-rren ɣef waya. Ttgugumen yal tikkelt aydeg ara asen-nini ma yettakf-d yizirekki tamemt.

column1: Ulac ccek dakken yal argaz yesɛa tameṭṭut ay t-iwatan swaswa akken ad tt-yaɣ yernu akka daɣ ay yella lḥal ed yal tameṭṭut. D acu kan
column2: mi ara nẓer dakken amdan yezmer ad yessen kra kan n timaḍ n yimdanen
column4: ur ttawḍen ara mraw n yimdanen wukud ara yecrek lbaḍna
column5: yernu mi ara d-nemmekti dakken d imelyunen n yimdanen ay izedɣen deg umaḍal
column8: werǧin yemlal-d kra n urgaz ed tmeṭṭut ay t-iwatan.

column1: Imẓerbeḍḍa teḍra-asen am yimeẓrislamen-nni yessexlaḍen iẓẓan ed tamemt. Imeẓrislamen ssnen kan taɛṛabt yernu xḍan akk tamaziɣt
column2: maca mi ara bɣun ad gren iman-nsen deg tesnilest
column3: ttinin-aɣ-d: Arut tamaziɣt s ugemmay aɛṛab. Imẓerbeḍḍa
column4: ur yettgen ara daɣ amgerrad gar yiẓẓan ed tamemt
column5: imi ay sɛan asenfar asertan d afuḥan
column7: snulfan-d tutlayt taqbaylit akken ad kellxen i kra n yibeṛhac
column8: yernu nekṛen tella tutlayt tamaziɣt. Imẓerbeḍḍa ed yimeẓrislamen ttetten seg yiwet n tbaqit: tin n tamemt ed yiẓẓan.
